original_text:
Beast of Wealth
Slot molto affascinante, Beast of Wealth ci porta in un ambiente orientaleggiante in cui potrete vincere grazie alle “bestie di ricchezza”.
Tema e grafica
Si, è vero, le slot a tema Oriente, in particolare quelle incentrate sulla cultura cinese sono davvero tante e ne abbiamo visto proprio di tutti i colori! Allora perché dovreste provare Beast of Wealth, nuova slot di casa Play’N’Go? Be’, i motivi sono tanti e li vedremo insieme nel corso di questa breve recensione!
Partiamo proprio dal tema, che come abbiamo già detto è incentrato sulla cultura orientale, ma in questo caso non abbiamo panda simpatici tra foglie di bambù, bensì quattro animali (la fenice, il drago, la tigre e la tartaruga) che somigliano molto alle maschere tradizionali cinesi e che sono riprodotte in maniera molto affascinante.
La griglia di gioco è inserita in una pagoda-tempio, illuminata dalle classiche lanterne e nel contesto di un paesaggio sfumato.
Tutti i simboli che troviamo sui rulli sono graficamente assai validi e nel complesso Beast of Wealth risulta essere davvero accattivante.
A rendere l’atmosfera di gioco ancora più coinvolgente ci pensa poi anche una colonna sonora orientaleggiante, che accompagna il giocatore mentre girano i rulli ma senza risultare in alcun modo invadente.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Beast of Wealth dal punto di vista della struttura di gioco è molto tradizionale: presenta infatti i canonici cinque rulli e tre righe, mentre i modi di vincita sono 243.
La puntata minima per ciascun giro è di soli 10 centesimi, mentre quella massima è di 100 €, un range abbastanza ampio che accontenta proprio tutti, sia i giocatori cauti che gli high rollers!
La volatilità di Beast of Wealth è media, si possono ottenere delle vincite piccole e constanti ma per i premi di un certo valore invece occorre avere un po’ di pazienza.
Proprio a proposito di premi, Beast of Wealth offre ben quattro jackpot: Minor, Grand, Major e Mini, su cui si possono mettere le mani quando si giocano i giri gratuiti; la vincita più alta che si po’ ottenere ammonta a 500.000 €, una cifra davvero incredibile, che rappresenta certamente il motivo più valido per giocare a questa slot!
Il ritorno teorico (RTP) di Beast of Wealth si attesta su un ottimo 96,17 %, lievemente al di sopra della media.
Simboli e funzionalità di Beast of Wealth
I simboli che possiamo trovare sui rulli di Beast of Wealth sono in parte tematici e in parte no. Tra le icone non tematiche abbiamo i numeri e le lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco dal 9 all’Asso, che sono anche i simboli con valore minore. I simboli tematici sono invece rappresentati dai quattro animali, la tigre, la tartaruga, la fenice e il dragone, che è tra tutte l’icona che paga di più.
I simboli speciali sono Wild e Scatter: il primo è un Gong, ha funzione di jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli, il secondo è uno Ying Yang, che regala Free Spins durante i quali si può provare a vincere i Jackpot!

raw_translation.response:
Beast of Wealth Slot Game
This stunning slot transports players into an oriental environment where they can win big thanks to the "beasts of wealth".
Theme and Graphics
It's true, there are many Oriental-themed slots, especially those focusing on Chinese culture, but why should you try Play'N'Go's new slot, Beast of Wealth? Well, there are many reasons, and we'll see them together in this brief review!
Let's start with the theme, which as already mentioned, is centered around Oriental culture. Instead of cute pandas among bamboo leaves, we have four animals (the Phoenix, Dragon, Tiger, and Tortoise) that resemble traditional Chinese masks and are reproduced in a fascinating way. The playing grid is set in a pagoda-temple, highlighted by classic lanterns and set against a faded landscape. All symbols found on the reels are graphically stunning and overall, Beast of Wealth is intriguing and captivating.
To immerse players even more, the game also features an oriental soundtrack that accompanies the spinning reels without being intrusive.
Main Features of the Slot
From a gameplay structure perspective, Beast of Wealth is fairly conventional. It features five reels and three rows, with 243 ways to win. The minimum bet per spin is only 10 cents, while the maximum is €100, providing a range suitable for both cautious players and high rollers. The game's volatility is medium, allowing for small, steady wins, but also for valuable prizes for those who have patience.
Regarding rewards, Beast of Wealth offers four jackpots: Minor, Grand, Major, and Mini, which can be won during free spins. The highest achievable win is €500,000, a jaw-dropping amount that represents the most compelling reason to play this slot! 
Moreover, the theoretical return to player (RTP) of Beast of Wealth is an outstanding 96.17%, slightly higher than the average.
Symbols and Features of Beast of Wealth
The symbols found on the reels in Beast of Wealth are partially thematic and partially not. Among the non-thematic icons are numbers and letters referring to playing cards from 9 to Ace, and are the lowest-paying symbols. The thematic symbols, on the other hand, are represented by the four animals- the Tiger, Tortoise, Phoenix, and Dragon- with the latter being the highest-paying icon. Special symbols in the game are the Wild, which is a gong and functions as a joker, replacing all other symbols, and the Scatter, which is a ying yang and awards free spins. During these free spins, players can try their luck at winning the jackpots mentioned before.

Beast of Wealth
This slot game is absolutely captivating, taking us on a journey through an oriental setting where you can win big thanks to the "beasts of wealth". 

Theme and Graphics
Yes, it's true, there are many slot games with an oriental theme, particularly those focused on Chinese culture, but we've truly seen it all! So why should you try Beast of Wealth, the new slot game from Play'N'Go? Well, there are many reasons and we'll discuss them together in this short review. 

Let's start with the theme, which as we've already said, is focused on oriental culture. However, in this case, we don't have cute pandas eating bamboo leaves, but rather four animals (the phoenix, dragon, tiger, and turtle) that resemble traditional Chinese masks, depicted in a highly fascinating way. 

The game grid is set in a temple-pagoda, illuminated by classic lanterns and set against a blurred landscape. All the symbols on the reels are highly impressive graphically, and overall, Beast of Wealth is truly captivating. 

The gaming atmosphere is further enhanced by an oriental soundtrack that accompanies the player while the reels spin but doesn't become intrusively overwhelming. 

Main Features of the Slot Machine
Beast of Wealth is a highly traditional slot game in terms of its gameplay structure, featuring the standard five reels and three rows, with 243 ways to win. The minimum bet per spin is just €0.10, while the maximum bet is €100, a range that satisfies everyone, from cautious players to high rollers! 

The volatility of Beast of Wealth is moderate, with opportunities to win small, steady prizes, but for more valuable prizes, a bit of patience is required. Speaking of prizes, Beast of Wealth offers four jackpots: Minor, Grand, Major, and Mini, which can be won during free spins. The highest possible payout is a whopping €500,000, an incredible amount that undoubtedly represents the most compelling reason to play this slot! 

The theoretical return to player (RTP) of Beast of Wealth is an excellent 96.17%, slightly above average. 

Symbols and Features of Beast of Wealth
The symbols featured on the reels of Beast of Wealth are partly themed and partly not. Amongst the non-themed icons are numbers and letters representing playing cards from 9 to Ace, which also happen to be the symbols with lower values. The themed symbols, on the other hand, are represented by the four animals: the tiger, turtle, phoenix, and dragon, with the dragon being the highest paying icon of them all. 

The special symbols are the Wild and Scatter symbols: the Wild symbol is represented by a Gong, acting as a jolly symbol that substitutes for all other symbols, while the Scatter symbol is the Ying Yang, awarding free spins during which players can try to win the jackpots!

The Wild symbol in Beast of Wealth is represented by a Gong, which acts as a substitute for all other symbols. The Scatter symbol in the game is the Ying Yang, which activates the free spins mode when three or more appear on the reels. The free spins mode provides players with the opportunity to trigger jackpots during the gameplay, making it one of the most exciting features of the game.

Jackpots and Maximum Payout

Return to Player (RTP)

The theoretical RTP of Beast of Wealth is 96.17%, which is slightly above average and quite appealing. The game's moderate volatility makes it an excellent choice for players who enjoy a balanced experience of winning small prizes, with occasional higher payouts available during the free spins mode and jackpot game.
